about_the_game:
Story-Driven

The storyline drives all gameplay, and combat is also part of the narrative. You will play as the protagonist named Chen, a character who has lost their memories, embarking on a journey of self-discovery in a fantasy world called Cang Geng Star.


Throughout the game, there are three key plotlines that intertwine as you delve deeper into the exploration. Each of these plotlines has its unique way of expression, allowing you to better track your progress. The three main plotlines are as follows:

1. The Disappeared Phoenix - The Truth of the Disaster
The Phoenix clan was once the oldest and most beloved beings on this continent. However, they all went to the north one day and there was no news about them since then.

2. Lost Memories - Personal Growth
Chen is a sensitive and gentle soul, with thoughts that unfold. Throughout the journey, their personal growth is a tale to be told. You will accompany them on this journey, and the next destination of this journey is...

3. Spreading Plague - Healing and Salvation
Cause and effect, the cycle of destiny. Divine wrath and human calamity, no one can be exempt.

Main Gameplay

Primarily Focused on Building The Inner World
If you are dissatisfied with your home, instead of running away from it, try to build it up. From the first piece of debris you clear, to farming, raising fish, crafting knickknacks, undertaking infrastructure development, decorating your home, to inviting important characters to your home, and cultivating relationships...

The outputs of the inner world play a vital role in the exploration of the external world. Now, you have already acquired many things: a garden, a farmland, a palace, a fountain. It is time to embark on the journey once again.

Secondary Focus on Repairing The External world
Clear the pollution on the world map, spread fragrance along the traveled path, repair the infrastructure damaged by the chaos, open up spatial channels, and reunite the trapped beings from disjointed spaces, bringing them back home and bringing smiles back to Cang Geng Star. And, when battle is inevitable, face it.

With flowers in the heart, we grow towards the sun.
Through this arduous journey, we reach the stars.
——Chen

The Five Traits of Love

Life is complicated, and straightforward reasoning or pure violence won't always work. Sometimes, you have to solve others' problems using their own methods. Use the five traits of love to solve problems throughout the world, and under each trait, there are two corresponding abilities.


Purity: Healing, Purification
Gentleness: Tranquility, Joy
Inclusiveness: Perception, Emotion
Strength: Courage, Resilience
Wisdom: Understanding, cognition

Some abilities are unlocked and upgraded within the inner world, while others are learned from other characters. Different plot events require different abilities and levels.

Companions

When heaven and earth resonate in my heart, all things become my guide. During your exploration, you will meet various companions and be touched by their unique traits as you get to know them. Chat with them and keep in touch, you will finally integrate their traits and transform them into the power of love. After establishing deep bonds with companions, you can invite them to visit your inner world and further interact with them, unlocking exclusive character storylines.

Assessing People Through Cooking

Create exclusive themed meals for important characters. Each dish tells a story. Before deciding on the dishes, you need to fully understand the characters to ensure that you accurately capture their characteristics and style. The completeness of the information will directly affect your choices during the cooking process. With sufficient information, you can make precise ingredient selections; however, with incomplete information, you will face various possible ingredient choices, while most of the time, only one is preferred by the characters.


Every cooking experience is a mini-game. Only pure craftsmanship and profound love can transform dishes into true works of art. Through meticulous craftsmanship and unique creativity, you will demonstrate respect and care for the characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400); AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 VRAM); Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: You have been constantly perplexed by a question. In search of the answer, you embark on a journey of exploration. You traverse the desolate lands of suffering and cross fragmented spaces of chaos. You never had a direction, yet you ultimately reached the harbor.
